product_name: Sherpani Solstice Ultralight Carry-On Luggage - Women's
long_description: True to the Sherpani passion for innovation, the Solstice Ultralight Carry-On Luggage is the quite possibly the lightest 22-inch carry-on available, yet it's loaded with great travel features. The women's 22-inch Sherpani Solstice Ultralight Carry-On Luggage weighs a mere 3.9 lbs. Fiberglass structure and smooth-rolling polyurethane wheels are tough yet lightweight. Smooth 1-touch retractable handle with innovative companion-bag stabilizer system lets you maneuver easily with a travel tote slipped over the handle (tote sold separately). Exterior fabric is 30-denier ripstop polyester with silicone-coated panels in tonal floral quilting. 2 comfortable rubber-grip grab handles provide lifting and carry options. 2 internal mesh organization pockets and an elastic clothing retainer keep clothes and small items organized. External zippered pocket on front stashes items you want kept handy; zippered magazine pocket on back has an interior mesh divider. Lockable zippers. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline).
short_description: True to the Sherpani passion for innovation, the Solstice Ultralight Carry-On Luggage is the quite possibly the lightest 22-inch carry-on available, yet it's loaded with great travel features.
